meanings.definition: The spreading of rumors or gossip.
meanings.sent1: Her constant rumormongerings caused unnecessary drama in the office.
meanings.sent2: The town was filled with rumormongerings about the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: The rumormongerings at the school were so exaggerated, they became like a game of telephone.
meanings.sent4: The rumormongerings in the small town spread faster than wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The impact of her rumormongerings was felt throughout the community.

meanings.definition: Someone who spreads rumors or gossip.
meanings.sent1: The rumormongerings in the neighborhood were always quick to share the latest news.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the biggest rumormongerings in town.
meanings.sent3: The rumormongerings at the party were like a group of chatty birds.
meanings.sent4: He was a skilled rumormongerings, able to turn a small story into a big scandal.
meanings.sent5: The rumormongerings thrived on the chaos they created with their gossip.
